response.overview: Wonder Kiera has been tracking her missing lasso. She hears a cry for help and knows the danger of a potential rescue mission or even a trap, but decides to investigate without her lasso. It becomes apparent very quickly that it is in fact a trap. Two of Maliki's slaves have been sent to retrieve her. Typically, these slaves should be no match, but they have been trained and she is without lasso. After battling both slaves, she finds herself exhausted and can't fight it when they chloro her. She awakens to find herself trapped in a stockade, face to face with Maliki. She learns very quickly that Maliki's intention is to make her another of his slaves. if she refuses and fights, he will simply kill her. Find out what happens.
response.title: Wonder Kiera
